definition: gauze hat/(fig.) job as an official
black hat (worn by feudal official)/fig. official post
lit. to lose one's black hat/to be sacked from an official post

sentences.english: The officer ended up losing his job because he accepted a bribe.
sentences.chinese: 由於收受賄賂，這個官員最終丟掉了自己的紗帽。

sentences.english: As on the preceding day, she wore her damask gown and her crape bonnet.
sentences.chinese: 她呢，和昨天一樣，花緞裙袍，縐紗帽。

sentences.english: Yan Wang is normally depicted wearing a Chinese judge's cap and sometimes appears on Chinese Hell Bank Notes.
sentences.chinese: 閻王通常戴着一頂烏紗帽，紙錢上也會有他的形象。

sentences.english: If the gender ratio in a region in the province is too high, its leaders will be sacked.
sentences.chinese: 該省性別比例過高的地方，政府領導將被摘掉烏紗帽。

definition: Shilong district of Pingdingshan city 平頂山市|平顶山市[Ping2 ding3 shan1 shi4], Henan
Old town district/Gucheng district of Lijiang city 麗江市|丽江市[Li4 jiang1 shi4], Yunnan
Yongdingmen, front gate of the outer section of Beijing's old city wall, torn down in the 1950s and reconstructed in 2005
Linhe district of Bayan Nur city 巴彥淖爾市|巴彦淖尔市[Ba1 yan4 nao4 er3 shi4], Inner Mongolia
Linqing county level city in Liaocheng 聊城[Liao2 cheng2], Shandong
street name in ancient Chang'an synonymous with brothel area/red-light district
Qiaodong District (various)/Qiaodong District of Shijiazhuang City 石家莊市|石家庄市[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1 Shi4], Hebei
